Exploration.Name: Mysterious Cave
Exploration.Description: You stumble upon a dark and mysterious cave. It looks like it hasn't been explored in ages.

Options.Outcome: You venture into the darkness, your eyes slowly adjusting to the dim light.
You decide it's best to avoid potential danger and continue on your path.

Exploration.Name: Overturned Cart
Exploration.Description: You find an overturned cart blocking your path. It looks like it was abandoned in a hurry.

Options.Outcome: You find some useful supplies scattered around, including a health potion.
You manage to right the cart and clear the path, but it takes some effort.

Combat.Name: Goblin Ambush
Combat.Description: A group of goblins ambushes you from the shadows.

Combat.Name: Lone Goblin
Combat.Description: A lone goblin stands in your path, looking for trouble.

Options.Outcome: You sneak up on the goblin and strike it...
Rather not fight right now. Best I just leave...
